statements: SELECT * FROM ab_testing_data;
SELECT user_id, group_name FROM ab_testing_data WHERE conversion_status = TRUE;
SELECT test_id, user_id, group_name, conversion_status, conversion_value FROM ab_testing_data ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT test_id, group_name FROM ab_testing_data WHERE conversion_value > 100;
SELECT user_id, group_name, conversion_status FROM ab_testing_data WHERE group_name = 'Control';
SELECT test_id, user_id, group_name, conversion_status, conversion_value FROM ab_testing_data WHERE conversion_status = TRUE ORDER BY conversion_value DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT test_id, user_id, group_name FROM ab_testing_data WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY test_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT group_name FROM ab_testing_data ORDER BY group_name ASC;
SELECT test_id, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM ab_testing_data GROUP BY test_id HAVING total_count > 5 ORDER BY total_count DESC;
SELECT user_id, AVG(conversion_value) AS avg_conversion_value FROM ab_testing_data GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY avg_conversion_value DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM marketing_data;
SELECT user_id, marketing_campaign FROM marketing_data ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, marketing_campaign, conversion_rate FROM marketing_data WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM test_results WHERE test_group = 'Group A';
SELECT test_id, experiment_name, result FROM test_results ORDER BY test_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, marketing_campaign, conversion_rate FROM marketing_data WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5
SELECT marketing_campaign, user_id FROM marketing_data ORDER BY marketing_campaign DESC
SELECT user_id, marketing_campaign, conversion_rate FROM marketing_data WHERE marketing_campaign LIKE '%summer%'
SELECT AVG(conversion_rate) as average_conversion_rate FROM marketing_data
SELECT user_id, SUM(conversion_rate) as total_conversion FROM marketing_data GROUP BY user_id
SELECT user_id, email FROM marketing_approach_a;
SELECT email, signup_date FROM marketing_approach_b ORDER BY signup_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, signup_date, conversion_rate FROM marketing_approach_a WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM marketing_approach_b WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT test_name, test_date, results FROM marketing_test_results WHERE test_group = 'A';
SELECT user_id, email, signup_date FROM marketing_approach_a ORDER BY signup_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT DISTINCT email FROM marketing_approach_b WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5;
SELECT user_id, email, signup_date, conversion_rate FROM marketing_approach_a WHERE signup_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT test_id, test_name, test_date FROM marketing_test_results WHERE test_group = 'A' ORDER BY test_date ASC;
SELECT MAX(conversion_rate) AS max_conversion_rate FROM marketing_approach_b WHERE conversion_rate IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns
SELECT campaign_name, start_date FROM marketing_campaigns
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC
SELECT * FROM experiment_groups WHERE group_id = 3
SELECT user_id, action_type, action_date FROM user_actions ORDER BY action_date
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT users.username, users.email, experiment_groups.group_name FROM users INNER JOIN experiment_groups ON users.user_id = experiment_groups.group_id;
SELECT users.username, user_actions.action_date FROM users INNER JOIN user_actions ON users.user_id = user_actions.user_id WHERE user_actions.action_type = 'click';
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE end_date < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT user_id, activity_type FROM user_activities WHERE activity_date BETWEEN '2021-06-01' AND '2021-06-30'
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY end_date
SELECT user_id, segment FROM user_segmentation ORDER BY segment_date ASC
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_date FROM user_activities WHERE campaign_id = 1
SELECT user_id, segment FROM user_segmentation WHERE segment_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT experiment_id, user_id, conversion_rate FROM experiment_results WHERE revenue > 1000
SELECT group_id, group_name FROM experiment_groups
